name: Roll of The DICED
description:
*This is a submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022

*Despite the volume bar, there is no sound currently in the game

Roll of The DICED is a turn-based, puzzle, strategy game, where you try your best to guide the "Rolling Diced Foods" to their separate bowls.

There are 3 types of diced foods:

1. [Diced Mango] can only rolls forward, and will roll sideways when blocked.

2. [Diced Pepper] can only rolls diagonally forward, and will roll diagonally forward when blocked.

3. [Diced Meat] changes roll forward/diagonally when blocked.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse0 - Click on Buttons
